    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class="header-navegacao header-home header-navegacao-ge" data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">combate</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-floating" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-floating" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cube-container"><div class="cube"><div class="face front"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">combate</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-top" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-top" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div><div id="busca-padrao"></div><div class="banner"><div class="opec-area opec-right"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_insert" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_AD != "undefined" && OAS_AD("Right")</script

    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

                <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/oRQ_SDEqsVbtk2gnJt9N_0EUvGc=/125x100/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2016/08/17/img_0479.jpg" alt="Anthony Johnson defende retorno de Jon Jones em disputa de título no UFC">
            </figure>
        </a>

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/noticia/2017/02/anthony-johnson-defende-retorno-de-jon-jones-em-disputa-de-titulo-no-ufc.html" title="Perto de encarar Daniel Cormier pelo cinturão da categoria dos pesos-meio-pesados do Ultimate, &quot;Rumble&quot; acredita que é justo &quot;Bones&quot; enfrentar o vencedor do confronto" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title"
            data-href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/noticia/2017/02/anthony-johnson-defende-retorno-de-jon-jones-em-disputa-de-titulo-no-ufc.html" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/oRQ_SDEqsVbtk2gnJt9N_0EUvGc=/125x100/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2016/08/17/img_0479.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title">Anthony Johnson defende retorno de Jon Jones em disputa de título no UFC</h3>
        </a>
    </div>

    <div class="gui-feed-hgroup gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper-with-thumb gui-image-hover">

            </figure>
        </a>

        //name: R7 - Prequal tag
        //created: 11/24/2014
        var asiPqTag = false;
        ChamandoURLAudienceScience = {
          'init': function(){
            ChamandoURLAudienceScience.urlRequisicaoDinamica();
          },
          'urlRequisicaoDinamica': function(){
            var cb = new Date().getTime();
            var asiPqTag = false;
            var urlModificada = "https://pq-direct.revsci.net/pql?placementIdList=uqMDA5,frDqFT&cb="+cb;
            $.ajax({
              dataType : 'script',
              chache : true,
              url : urlModificada,
              success : function() {}
            });
          }
        };

      </script>

          <script type="text/javascript">
            function fechaAds(){
              ads=document.getElementById('ads-sniffer');
              ads.parentNode.removeChild(ads);
            }
          </script>
          <a id="closeBtn" style="z-index:1; cursor:pointer; position: absolute; right:0; top:0; width:61px; height:17px; background-image:url(https://img.r7.com/images/2017/01/05/957hd2p3f5_8gp35i3xl7_file)" onclick="fechaAds()">&#160;</a>

              document.getElementById('ads-sniffer').style.display = 'block';

  <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
      var time = null,
          targetItem = $('.target-item');

      function hideShareIcons () {
        targetItem.fadeOut();
        $('.r7opened').removeClass('r7opened');
      }

      $('.open-item').hover(function() {
        var self = $(this);

        if(!self.hasClass('r7opened')){
          hideShareIcons();
        }
        clearTimeout(time);

        self.find('.target-item').stop(true, true).fadeIn("fast");
        self.addClass('r7opened');
      }, function(){
        time = setTimeout(hideShareIcons, 500);
      });

      var $searchBar = $('.header-menu-horizontal-search-bar'),
          $socialAndSearchHide = $('.header-menu-horizontal-social-items, .header-menu-horizontal-send-video'),
          $topVideoFilter = $searchBar.find('.r7-top-video-filter');

      $(document).on('click', function(e) {
        var t = $(e.target),
            mod = 'header-menu-horizontal',
            ignoredClasses = [mod + '-search-bar', mod + '-search', 'open-search-bar', 'search-icon', 'r7-top-video-main-form', 'r7-top-video-filter-opener', 'r7-top-video-input', 'r7-top-video-btn'],
            hasClass = true;

        _.each(ignoredClasses, function(item) {
          if(t.hasClass(item)) {
            hasClass = false;
          }
        });

        if (hasClass) {
          $searchBar.hide();
          $topVideoFilter.removeClass('is-visible');
          $socialAndSearchHide.removeClass('is-hidden').addClass('is-visible');
        }
      });

      $('.open-search-bar')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          $searchBar.show();
          $socialAndSearchHide.addClass('is-hidden');
        });

      var checkInput = function() {
        var t = $(this), label = t.parent().find('label');

        if (t.val().length > 0) {
          label.fadeIn();
        }
        else {
          label.fadeOut();
        }
      };

      $('#login-input, #pass-input').on('focus blur keyup', checkInput);

      $('.search-action')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e){
          return $('.header-menu-horizontal-search').val().length > 0;
        });

      var offset = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').offset().top;

      $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset', offset);

      var $window = $(window);

      $window.scroll(function(){
        var stickyShareTop = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset');
          scrollTop = $window.scrollTop();
          if (scrollTop > stickyShareTop) {
            $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('#header-menu-horizontal:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info:not(.bg-sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.pre-main-content:not(.sticky)').addClass('bg-sticky');
          }
          else {
            if ($('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').hasClass('sticky')){
              $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').removeClass('sticky');
              $('#header-menu-horizontal').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.pre-main-content').removeClass('bg-sticky');
            }
          }
      });
    });
  </script>

               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

          <div id="r7ad-bgRight">
            <script>
             r7ad.printGAds([204,792], {pos:"bg", context:"right"}).success(function() {
               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

        <div class="pre-main-content">

           
          <div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="chrome">
            <div>

                    <div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">
          <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      if ((event.slot.getTargeting('pos') == "bg")){
        if(!event.isEmpty){
          r7adv.has_bg = true;
        }
      }
    });

    $(function() {
      postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar', '<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');
    });
  </script>
    <div class="r7-adv-skyscraper scrollable" id="r7-skyscraper-sidebar">
      
    </div>

<div id="pop-chamada-duas-colunas-56f98f68490f8c15fb00bc31"
  class="pop-chamada-duas-colunas is-schumi ubuntu">

  <div class="destaque">
    <div class="destaque-image">
      <a href="http://www.arcacenter.com.br/" onclick="openInNewWindow('http://www.arcacenter.com.br/');return false;" title="Saiba como ter acesso ao melhor do mercado editorial em apenas um clique">
        <img src="http://img.r7.com/images/2016/03/28/8htydeqsq1_79vd27bb0n_file?dimensions=300x141" alt="Saiba como ter acesso ao melhor do mercado editorial em apenas um clique">
      </a>
      <div class="destaque-social">

  <script>
    (function() {
      // console.log('.pop-chamada-duas-colunas-56f98f68490f8c15fb00bc31 .destaque-social-icon');
      $('#pop-chamada-duas-colunas-56f98f68490f8c15fb00bc31 .destaque-social-icon').on('click', function(e) {
        e && e.preventDefault();

        var options = 'width=600,height=300,menubar=no,location=no,resizable=no,scrollbars=no',
          url = $(this).attr('data-href');

        <!-- Tracking -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
    // criando elemento para url canônica
    var linkCanonical   = document.createElement('link');
    linkCanonical.href  = "" || location.href;
    linkCanonical.rel   = "canonical";

    (function() {
      // adicionando metatag referente a url canonica dentro da tag <head/>
      document.head.appendChild(linkCanonical);

      //GOOGLE ANALYTICS UNIVERSAL 
      (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
          i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
          i[r] = i[r] || function() {
              (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
          }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
          a = s.createElement(o),
              m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
          a.async = 1;
          a.src = g;
          m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
      })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

      ga('create', 'UA-10631407-1', 'auto');

      //evita ReferenceError
      dataLayer = (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined')? dataLayer : {};
      if(dataLayer.page_name         ) {ga('set', 'dimension1',  dataLayer.page_name         );}
      if(dataLayer.site_section      ) {ga('set', 'dimension2',  dataLayer.site_section      );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section       ) {ga('set', 'dimension3',  dataLayer.sub_section       );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_2     ) {ga('set', 'dimension4',  dataLayer.sub_section_2     );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_3     ) {ga('set', 'dimension5',  dataLayer.sub_section_3     );}
      if(dataLayer.content_id        ) {ga('set', 'dimension6',  dataLayer.content_id        );}
      if(dataLayer.content_type      ) {ga('set', 'dimension7',  dataLayer.content_type      );}
      if(dataLayer.content_title     ) {ga('set', 'dimension8',  dataLayer.content_title     );}
      if(dataLayer.publication_date  ) {ga('set', 'dimension9',  dataLayer.publication_date  );}
      if(dataLayer.page_url          ) {ga('set', 'dimension10', dataLayer.page_url          );}
      if(dataLayer.short_url         ) {ga('set', 'dimension11', dataLayer.short_url         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_age         ) {ga('set', 'dimension12', dataLayer.tailt_age         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_gender      ) {ga('set', 'dimension13', dataLayer.tailt_gender      );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_city        ) {ga('set', 'dimension14', dataLayer.tailt_city        );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_state       ) {ga('set', 'dimension15', dataLayer.tailt_state       );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_country     ) {ga('set', 'dimension16', dataLayer.tailt_country     );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_profiles    ) {ga('set', 'dimension17', dataLayer.tailt_profiles    );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    ) {ga('set', 'dimension18', dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    );}
      if(dataLayer.minute            ) {ga('set', 'dimension19', dataLayer.minute            );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_photoGallery) {ga('set', 'dimension20', dataLayer.embed_photoGallery);}
      if(dataLayer.embed_poll        ) {ga('set', 'dimension21', dataLayer.embed_poll        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_quiz        ) {ga('set', 'dimension22', dataLayer.embed_quiz        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_playlist    ) {ga('set', 'dimension23', dataLayer.embed_playlist    );}


      dataLayer.reset_content_id = function(content_id) {
        dataLayer.content_id = content_id;
        ga('set', 'dimension6', dataLayer.content_id);
      }
      dataLayer.reset_content_type = function(content_type) {
        dataLayer.content_type = content_type;
        ga('set', 'dimension7', dataLayer.content_type);
      }

      ga('send', 'pageview');

      var adblock_status = (Boolean( document.getElementById( 'ads-container-r7adv' ) ))? 'OFF' : 'ON';
      ga('send', 'event', 'Adblock', 'Adblock-'+adblock_status, {nonInteraction: true });
    })();
  </script>

    <script>
      //submenu nao deve ser menor do que o menu pai
      $(".r7-nav-menu-secondary-list").each(function(index){
        var child_width = $(this).outerWidth(),
            parent_width = $(this).closest('.r7-nav-menu-list-item').outerWidth();

        if(child_width < parent_width) {
          $(this).width(parent_width);
        }
      });
    </script>

  <p>
    <a href="/videos/cruzeiro/t/ultimos/v/clube-tv-tv-cruzeiro-ep-169/5756309/">Clube TV - TV Cruzeiro - Ep.169</a>
  </p>
</li>
<li  title="TV Cruzeiro - Jogadores do Cruzeiro participam do Midia Day, do Grupo Globo" data-video-title="TV Cruzeiro - Jogadores do Cruzeiro participam do Midia Day, do Grupo Globo" data-video-id="5756783" data-video-data-exibicao="26/03/2017">
  <div class="video-trilho">
  <a href="/videos/cruzeiro/t/ultimos/v/tv-cruzeiro-jogadores-do-cruzeiro-participam-do-midia-day-do-grupo-globo/5756783/" class="borda-interna">
    <img alt="TV Cruzeiro - Jogadores do Cruzeiro participam do Midia Day, do Grupo Globo" height="108px" src="http://s04.video.glbimg.com/180x108/5756783.jpg" width="180px" />


    <span class="duracao">02:45</span>
</a></div>
